thread.title: Google chases streaming crowd with sprightlier Chromecast
thread.title_full: Google chases streaming crowd with sprightlier Chromecast - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Google chases streaming crowd with sprightlier Chromecast
text:
Photo: Tony Avelar, Associated Press The redesigned and updated Chromecast for TV comes in different colors and works better than the old model, allowing users to download movies faster. The redesigned and updated Chromecast for TV comes in different...
Google is chasing the digital streaming generation a little harder these days with a nicely redesigned Chromecast for the TV and a new model just for music. The redesigned and updated Chromecast for TV comes in different colors and works better than the old model, allowing users to download movies faster. The redesigned and updated Chromecast for TV comes in different...
Google is chasing the digital streaming generation a little harder these days with a nicely redesigned Chromecast for the TV and a new model just for music.
